ai-iti15:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti15:2.1_0: “Mendicants, I do not see a single fetter, fettered by which people wander and transmigrate for a long time like the fetter of craving.
ai-iti15:2.2_0: Fettered by craving, people wander and transmigrate for a long time.”
ai-iti15:3.1_0: “Prince a person with craving for sensual pleasures,
ai-iti15:4.3_0: I am rid of craving, free of grasping,
ai-iti15:4.4_0: with few possessions, not full of desire.
ai-iti15:5.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
